text: "Homer the Whopper" is the season premiere episode of the twenty-first season of The Simpsons. It first aired on September 27, 2009. In this episode, Comic Book Guy creates a superhero called Everyman, who takes powers from other superheroes. Homer is cast as the lead in the film adaptation. To get Homer into shape, the movie studio hires a celebrity fitness trainer, Lyle McCarthy, to help him. Homer gets into great shape and is really excited, but when McCarthy leaves to train another client, he starts over-eating again and ultimately this leads to the film's failure. == Other websites == * Category:2009 television episodes Category:Emmy Award winning programs Category:The Simpsons (season 21) episodes
title: Homer the Whopper
